notes: 2.2.1: Changed Pyra to have double break whereas Mythra puts a counter on each of your creatures. On a surface level you can double up on counters or spread the counters, but pyra can hit easier whereas mythra is just the abyss. Arguably a little boring but also it’s a double face card with a lot of complex play patterns.
